description:
Eldest son of Duke Ruine, the ruler of Labyrinthos, and one of the heroes of the "Twilight of the Demon Gods." At first glance, he may seem like a cheerful, handsome young man, but there`s more to him than meets the eye. He enjoys using his magic blade, which sucks away life energy, to slaughter monsters. Anna`s lover.
Source: Official page
name: Cedric Ruine
